caption:
The photograph captures a close-up view of an outdoor setting where a lizard is seen resting on a rock. The environment includes leafy green plants surrounding the focal point where the lizard is located, contributing to a natural, lush setting. The rock surface upon which the lizard lies is irregular in shape with a rough texture, and may exhibit varying colors such as grays or browns, blending with the dirt and natural debris around it.

The lizard itself has a mottled appearance, possibly providing camouflage against the rocky background. Its scales reflect a mix of browns and muted tones which help it merge with its surroundings. The image is somewhat shadowy with spots of sunlight filtering through the foliage above, creating a dappled light effect on the rock and lizard.

This serene scene mainly evokes a sense of quiet and seclusion, typically found in a natural habitat untouched by urban disturbances. The focus and composition of the image emphasize the lizard in its natural environment, showcasing the animal's interaction with its surroundings.
title: Lizard stretches out on rock near the shore of ha ha tonka lake
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
